==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|大|丶|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s|t1=big; great}} – excessive.

===Etymology===
A superlative derivative of {{och-l|大|big}} – be too great, very great, excessive.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=tài
|c=taai3,taai3-2
|c_note=taai3-2 - “Mrs.” when used on its own
|h=pfs=thai
|md=tái
|mn=thài
|w=2tha
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=y
|cat=a,adv,n,pn
}}

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[too]]; [[so]] {{gloss|modifying adjectives; often used with {{zh-l|了}} at the end of the sentence for emphasis}}
#: {{zh-x|太 熱 了！|It's '''so''' hot!}}
#: {{zh-x|別 吃 太 多 派。|Don't eat '''too''' much pie.}}
#* {{zh-x|他 的 褲子{zi} 太 短，外套 和 背心 又 太 肥大。|His trousers were too short and his coat and vest '''too''' loose.}}
# {{lb|zh|usually in negative sentences}} [[very]]; [[quite]]
#: {{zh-x|他 不 太 舒服。|He's not '''very''' well.}}
# [[most]]; [[utmost]]
# [[highest]]; [[greatest]]
# [[senior]]; [[noble]]
# [[wife]]; [[Miss]]; [[Mrs]]
#: {{zh-x|太太{tai}|wife}}
#* {{zh-x|李 太{taai3-2}|Mrs. Li|C}}
#* {{zh-x|陳 太{taai3-2}|Mrs. Chen|C}}
# {{zh-abbrev|太湖|[[Lake Tai]], a lake in Southern [[Jiangsu]], China}}
# {{zh-abbrev|太平洋|[[Pacific Ocean]]}}

====See also====
* {{sense|too}}
{{zh-dial}}

===Etymology 1===
{{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=ふと}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|h|{{ja-accent/unvoiced|ふ}}|と}}<ref name="NHK">{{R:NHK Hatsuon}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ɸɯ̥ᵝto̞]}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ふと}}

# [[fatness]]
# a [[fat]] [[person]], a [[fatty]]
# [[fat]]-[[neck]]ed [[shamisen]]
# [[thick]] [[thread]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|樺太|^からふと}}, {{ja-r|唐太|^からふと}}: [[Sakhalin]] {{qualifier|use of {{lang|ja|太}} here is [[ateji]]}}
{{der-bottom}}

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|fat person}} {{ja-r|でぶ}}
* {{sense|shamisen}} {{ja-r|太棹|ふとざお}}
* {{sense|thread}} {{ja-r|太糸|ふといと}}

====Prefix====
{{ja-pos|ふと|prefix}}

# added to words describing [[god]]s or the [[emperor]] or other [[exalted]] subjects to denote [[greatness]] or [[excellence]]
#* {{RQ:Manyoshu|17|4031}}; [http://etext.virginia.edu/japanese/manyoshu/Man17Yo.html text here]
#*: 奈加等美乃 敷刀能里⟨等其⟩等 伊比波良倍 安⟨賀⟩布伊能知毛 多我多米尓奈礼
#*:: 中臣の '''太'''祝詞言 言ひ祓へ 贖ふ命も 誰がために汝れ
#*:: なかとみの '''ふと'''のりとごと いひはらへ あかふいのちも たがためになれ
#*:: ''Nakatomi no / '''futo'''noritogoto / iiharae / akau inochi mo / ta ga tame ni nare''
#*:: Reciting the Nakatomi's '''excellent''' ritual offering, whose [long] life was prayed for? Yours.}}
# added to regular nouns to denote [[fatness]] or [[thickness]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''太'''腿、'''太'''箸|'''ふと'''-もも、'''ふと'''-ばし|the thigh (the '''thick''' part of the leg), '''fat''' chopsticks (used at New Years)}}

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|太織|ふと.おり}}: alternate for {{ja-l|太絹}}
* {{ja-r|太絹|ふとぎぬ}}: a type of [[cloth]], [[woven]] using [[raw]] [[silk]]
* {{ja-r|太巻き|ふとまき}}, {{ja-r|太巻|ふとまき}}: a [[fat]] [[roll]], often of [[sushi]]
* {{ja-r|太腿|ふともも}}: the [[thigh]]
* {{ja-r|太箸|ふとばし}}: special [[fat]] [[chopsticks]] used at [[New Years]]
{{der-bottom}}
